title: Which is the temporary capital of Punjab after 1947? - Quora

response.answer_text: Chandigarh derive its name from the temple of 'Chandi Mandir' set in the site selected for the city. Before Partion of the India capital of Punjab was Lahore. once independence, Shimla was made the temporary capital of Punjab, though several of its offices were located in Ambala, Jalandhar or Patiala.
